data.name: The Agency: Chapter 2 Soundtrack, Artbook and Director's Commentary
data.detailed_description:
Re-live the gripping steampunk mystery of "The Agency" by listening to it's iconic and innovative soundtrack. Featuring all the tracks composed for the game and a Director's commentary too (by Antonio Lorenzo Carino - Composer and Director for "The Agency) this DLC will really give you inside access to the workings and thoughts behind this intriguing Visual Novel Series.

Tracks Included:

1 - The Commodore's Suite
2 - Esmeralda's Theme
3 - A Meal with Friends
4 - Solving the Woodshell
5 - The Westwood Hotel
6 - A Fateful Meeting
7 - The DragonFly
8 - Haunting Questions
9 - Intrigue Arises
10 - The Silver Wings Bar
11 - Director's Commentary

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
